description: Lalla is a pink Tabby cat girl and the only female member of the group, who is the village`s aspiring signer. She likes to dance and perform but also doesn`t want her private stuff to be touched. She`s very posh, likes attention and likes to be pretty, but also very kind to her friends. She lives with her mother and shown to collect various types of dolls and cute stuff.
name: Lalla
